name: Chaos
description:
Experience a post-apocalyptic world where your survival skills are crucial.

Your aim is the survive and escape from the city by following the story.

You need to cooperate with the gangs to help you escape from the city while trying to survive.

It is the age of Chaos, everyone is alone, everyone is dangerous, and you have to be tough to complete missions.



The Chaos is the game where you are taking control of your character which you choose and escape from the city that is under military control.

The Game Includes;

  • Story Missions to Complete
  • Shelter Management and Upgrade
  • Crafting Shelter Tools and Usable Items
  • Barter System
  • Loot From Character and Some of The Buildings
  • City Exploration
  • Day and Night Cycle
  • Dynamic Weather System
  • ...and more

EXPLORE THE VALSANTON CITY

Explore the Valsanton City to find items that could help you to survive and upgrade your shelter. The City is full of chaos and danger.

UPGRADE YOUR SHELTER

Your shelter is your safe zone, where you can rest and craft items. You can upgrade your shelter in various ways to get more benefits from it.

SURVIVE

The city is in chaos, danger in the streets, nowhere is safe and nobody is trustable. You have to survive while completing the missions of your destiny!

USE TECHNOLOGY

Use technological tools for your goals, hack devices to accomplish your missions, and loot buildings.

FOLLOW YOUR DESTINY

Follow your destiny, and complete all the missions to escape from the city
